overview: This film is set at a gas station service station. While the manager, Chikasugi (Yoshimura Kaijin), and a part-time worker, Takarai (ozono Mana), are having an incomprehensible conversation, a novelist, Nemori (Okabe Takashi), comes to visit, accompanied by a nurse, Shimeno (Kinoshita Akari). Nemori tells Chikasugi that he and Chikasugi are half-brothers, and asks Chikasugi to sue the hospital over "rumors of medical mistakes" concerning his father, who is hospitalized in a vegetative state.
title: またここか
